section.title: CVS
section.para: The CVS button shows a page that contains information on how to access the CVS repository. Use this information to configure your client for CVS access.
This page also displays some statistics about the selected project's CVS tree.
The Browse CVS Repository link opens the viewcvs web interface, where you can view the CVS repository, view differences between revisions, download versions of a file.

note.para: Only public projects will show the browse CVS repository link.
